    • makeColorGradient

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color makeColorGradient​(long value, double freq, double p1, double p2, double p3, int center, int width)
      Generates a color from rainbow spectrum
      Parameters:
      value - determines the color with freq
      freq - frequency
      p1 - phase1
      p2 - phase2
      p3 - phase3
      center - center of the spectrum
      width - width of the spectrum
      Returns:
      a color from rainbow hue
